QUESTION_1.body: I value consistency and sustainability over potential and growth

QUESTION_2.body: I don't mind putting in extra hours if it means more chances for promotion and upwards mobility in the workplace

QUESTION_3.body: Work-life balance is of utmost importance to me and I desire flexibility with my job

QUESTION_4.body: Ethics does not matter to me in regards to what company I work for as long as I am compensated well

QUESTION_5.body: I prefer working within groups, socializing and creating bonds with the people I collaborate with

QUESTION_6.body: I value smaller workplaces with more interconnected groups and sectors

QUESTION_7.body: I think of my future career as a way to realize my best self, rather than an avenue to make money
